title: Lovely and cosy movie for the whole family
review:
In a time of super fast paced cartoons .... with mindless and loud action.
it's great to see a classic way of making movies everyone that like to relax and be entertained can enjoy.

title: Language thing
review: We could not stand to watch more than 10min without the regular "Swedish-finnish" accent.

title: Reminds me of Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer
review: Charming kids story for the Christmas season. Clearly a new classic holiday film for the kids. What a perfect excuse for going to the cinema with your family.
